title: Stories From India
description:
In this episode, Sapphire shares stories from our Indian listeners. Tune in to learn about the Chalava, a mysterious haunted house, the urban legend of Nale Ba, and a lonely ghost at the beach.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
